channel.title: Online Privacy on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Online Privacy on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 50K YouTubers rage against AI spying that could expose identities
item.description: Adult YouTubers defend childish viewing habits in fight to block AI age checks.

item.title: YouTube backlash begins: “Why is AI combing through every single video I watch?”
item.description: Adult YouTubers defend childish viewing habits in fight to block AI age checks.

item.title: ChatGPT users shocked to learn their chats were in Google search results
item.description: OpenAI scrambles to remove personal ChatGPT conversations from Google results.

item.title: YouTube’s selfie collection, AI age checks are concerning, privacy experts say
item.description: Any YouTuber wrongly labeled a teen must provide an ID, credit card, or selfie.

item.title: Will AI end cheap flights? Critics attack Delta’s “predatory” AI pricing.
item.description: Your data could soon be used to spike flight costs, as Delta expands AI pilot.
